about.metaDescription: Learn about Aura Lumina's mission to celebrate modest fashion and connect women with trusted local boutiques across Morocco.
about.intro: Aura Lumina was born from a simple belief: every woman deserves to feel beautiful, confident, and true to herself. We're here to connect you with the finest modest fashion Morocco has to offer.
about.whyPara1: Finding beautiful modest fashion shouldn't be a challenge. Yet for many women across Morocco, discovering quality abayas and modest wear meant endless searching, uncertain quality, and disconnected shopping experiences.
about.whyPara2: We created Aura Lumina to change that. Our platform bridges the gap between talented local boutiques and women seeking elegant, modest fashion. We personally visit each shop, verify their quality, and share their stories with you.
about.whyPara3: More than a directory, Aura Lumina is a community. Through our blog, we share styling inspiration, beauty tips, and the stories of the artisans behind each piece. We believe that modest fashion is not just about what you wear‚Äîit's about how it makes you feel.
about.missionText: To empower women to embrace their unique style through modest fashion, while supporting local artisans and boutiques that share our commitment to quality, authenticity, and beautiful craftsmanship.
about.valuesSubtitle: Our values guide everything we do, from the shops we partner with to the content we create.
about.valueAuthDesc: We celebrate real style that reflects who you are. No trends for trends' sake‚Äîjust timeless elegance that feels true to you.
about.valueCommDesc: We believe in supporting local artisans and boutiques, building a network of women who uplift each other through fashion and business.
about.valueQualDesc: Every shop we partner with is personally vetted for craftsmanship, quality materials, and exceptional customer service.
about.valueModDesc: We honor the beauty of modest dressing, offering inspiration that helps you feel confident, comfortable, and elegant.
about.joinDesc: Whether you're looking for your next favorite abaya, seeking style inspiration, or own a boutique that shares our values‚Äîwe'd love to connect with you.

contact.metaDescription: Have questions or want to partner with Aura Lumina? Reach out to us. We'd love to hear from you.
contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a question, want to partner with us, or just want to say hello? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.newsletterLabel: I'd like to receive occasional updates about new shops, style guides, and beauty tips from Aura Lumina.
contact.ctaDesc: Join our growing network of trusted partner shops. We help local boutiques reach women who value quality, authenticity, and beautiful craftsmanship.
contact.careersDesc: We're always looking for passionate people who share our love for modest fashion and want to make a difference. If you're creative, driven, and believe in our mission, we'd love to hear from you.
contact.careersNote: Send us your resume and a brief introduction telling us why you'd be a great fit for Aura Lumina.

faq.metaDescription: Find answers to common questions about Aura Lumina, our partner shops, modest fashion, and beauty recommendations.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Aura Lumina, our partner shops, and how we can help you embrace modest elegance.
faq.stillDesc: We're here to help! Reach out to us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
faq.aboutA1: Aura Lumina is a modest fashion and beauty platform that connects women with trusted local boutiques across Morocco. We curate elegant abayas, modest fashion inspiration, and halal beauty content to help you embrace your style with confidence and authenticity.
faq.aboutA2: No, we don't sell products directly. Instead, we partner with verified local boutiques across Morocco. When you find a piece you love, you can visit the shop directly or contact them via WhatsApp to make a purchase.
faq.aboutQ3: How do you choose your partner shops?
faq.aboutA3: We personally visit and verify each boutique before featuring them on our platform. We assess quality of products, customer service, authenticity of craftsmanship, and alignment with modest fashion values.
faq.shopQ1: How do I purchase from a partner shop?
faq.shopA1: Each shop profile includes contact information including phone number, WhatsApp, and location. You can reach out directly to inquire about products, prices, availability, and arrange your purchase or visit.
faq.shopQ2: Can I order online from the shops?
faq.shopA2: This depends on the individual shop. Some partner boutiques offer delivery services while others are in-store only. Contact the shop directly to learn about their purchasing and delivery options.
faq.shopQ3: What payment methods do shops accept?
faq.shopA3: Payment methods vary by shop. Most accept cash, and many also accept bank transfers or mobile payment. Contact the shop directly for their specific payment options.
faq.shopQ4: Can I return or exchange items?
faq.shopA4: Return and exchange policies are set by each individual shop. We recommend asking about their policy before making a purchase. Most shops are happy to accommodate exchanges for sizing issues.
faq.prodQ1: How do I find my size?
faq.prodA1: We recommend visiting our Size Guide page for general measurements. For the best fit, contact the shop directly‚Äîmany offer personalized consultations and can help you find your perfect size.
faq.prodA2: Many of our partner shops feature handcrafted pieces made by local artisans. Each shop profile highlights their specialties, including handmade and custom embroidery options.
faq.prodQ3: Can I request custom designs or alterations?
faq.prodA3: Yes! Many of our partner boutiques offer customization services. Contact them directly to discuss custom designs, fabric choices, or alterations to existing pieces.
faq.beautyQ1: Are the beauty products you recommend halal?
faq.beautyA1: We focus on recommending halal-certified and vegan-friendly beauty products. Our beauty articles highlight brands that align with ethical and halal beauty standards.
faq.beautyQ2: Can I contribute to your blog?
faq.beautyA2: We love hearing from our community! If you're interested in contributing articles about modest fashion, beauty tips, or lifestyle content, please reach out through our Contact page.
faq.beautyQ3: How often do you publish new content?
faq.beautyA3: We publish new articles weekly, covering topics from styling guides and fashion trends to skincare routines and self-care tips. Subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated!
faq.boutiqueQ1: How can my shop become a partner?
faq.boutiqueA1: We're always looking for quality modest fashion boutiques to join our network. Visit our Contact page to submit your shop for consideration. We'll review your application and schedule a visit.
faq.boutiqueQ2: Is there a fee to be featured?
faq.boutiqueA2: Please contact us directly to learn about our partnership options and any associated fees. We offer different partnership levels to suit various business needs.
faq.boutiqueQ3: What are the requirements to become a partner?
faq.boutiqueA3: We look for boutiques that offer quality products, excellent customer service, and align with modest fashion values. Shops must be legally registered and have a physical location in Morocco.

beauty.metaDescription: Discover halal beauty tips, skincare routines, and self-care rituals designed to help you look and feel your best while staying true to your values.
beauty.heroDesc: Discover halal beauty tips, skincare routines, and self-care rituals designed to help you look and feel your best while staying true to your values.
beauty.tip1Text: Drink 8 glasses of water daily for glowing skin from within.
beauty.tip2Text: Aim for 7-8 hours of sleep to allow skin to repair overnight.
beauty.tip3Text: Apply sunscreen daily, even on cloudy days and under your hijab.
beauty.tip4Text: Include antioxidant-rich foods for naturally radiant skin.
beauty.noArticles: No articles found for this category.
beauty.newsletterDesc: Get weekly beauty tips and exclusive offers.
beauty.editorsPicksSubtitle: Hand-selected halal beauty products we love and recommend.
beauty.tutorialDesc: Learn the secrets to a flawless everyday makeup look
beauty.art1Excerpt: Build an effective skincare routine using only halal and vegan-friendly products. Morning and evening rituals for glowing skin.
beauty.art2Excerpt: Achieve the perfect everyday makeup look that enhances your natural beauty. Simple techniques for a flawless finish.
beauty.art3Excerpt: Keep your hair healthy and nourished under your hijab. Essential tips for maintaining moisture and preventing damage.
beauty.art4Excerpt: Create a weekly self-care routine that nourishes your body, mind, and soul. Relaxation techniques and pampering ideas.
beauty.art5Excerpt: Discover the best halal-certified beauty brands offering high-quality makeup and skincare products.
beauty.art6Title: DIY Face Masks with Kitchen Ingredients
beauty.art6Excerpt: Create nourishing face masks at home using natural ingredients from your kitchen. Recipes for every skin type.

legal.privacyDescription: Learn how Aura Lumina collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
legal.termsDescription: Read the terms and conditions for using Aura Lumina's website and services.
legal.cookiesDescription: Learn how Aura Lumina uses cookies and similar technologies on our website.
legal.privacyIntro1: Aura Lumina ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website auralumina.com and use our services.
legal.privacyIntro2: Please read this privacy policy carefully. By using our website, you consent to the practices described in this policy.
legal.personalInfoDesc: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide when you:
legal.personalInfoList4: Interact with us on social media
legal.infoList5: Any other information you choose to share
legal.autoCollectedDesc: When you visit our website, we may automatically collect certain information, including:
legal.autoList4: Pages visited and time spent on each page
legal.howWeUseDesc: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:
legal.useList1: Sending you our newsletter and marketing communications (with your consent)
legal.useList2: Responding to your inquiries and providing customer support
legal.useList3: Processing partnership applications from shop owners
legal.useList4: Improving our website, content, and user experience
legal.useList5: Analyzing website traffic and usage patterns
legal.useList6: Protecting against fraud and unauthorized access
legal.infoSharingDesc: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
legal.shareList1Desc: We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business (e.g., email marketing platforms, analytics providers).
legal.shareList2Desc: We may disclose information if required by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.
legal.shareList3Desc: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred to the acquiring entity.
legal.dataSecurityDesc: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
legal.yourRightsDesc: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information:
legal.rightAccessDesc: Request a copy of the personal information we hold about you
legal.rightCorrectionDesc: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
legal.rightDeletionDesc: Request deletion of your personal information
legal.rightOptOutDesc: Unsubscribe from marketing communications at any time
legal.rightPortabilityDesc: Request a copy of your data in a portable format
legal.exerciseRights: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at
legal.cookiesSectionDesc: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. For detailed information about our use of cookies, please see our
legal.thirdPartyLinksDesc: Our website may contain links to third-party websites, including our partner shops and social media platforms. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information.
legal.childrensPrivacyDesc: Our website is not intended for children under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.
legal.changesToPolicyDesc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
legal.contactUsDesc: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
legal.acceptanceOfTermsDesc: By accessing and using the Aura Lumina website (auralumina.com), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website.
legal.descriptionOfServiceDesc: Aura Lumina is a platform that celebrates modest fashion and beauty, connecting users with curated content and trusted local boutiques in Morocco. We provide fashion inspiration, beauty tips, and information about our partner shops.
legal.userConductDesc: When using our website, you agree to:
legal.conductList1: Use the website only for lawful purposes
legal.conductList2: Not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the website
legal.conductList3: Not interfere with or disrupt the website's functionality
legal.conductList4: Not upload or transmit any harmful content, including viruses or malicious code
legal.conductList5: Not use the website to harass, abuse, or harm others
legal.conductList6: Not scrape, copy, or reproduce our content without permission
legal.intellectualPropertyDesc1: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, images, graphics, logos, and design elements, is the property of Aura Lumina or our content creators and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
legal.intellectualPropertyDesc2: You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works from our content without our explicit written permission.
legal.partnerShopsDesc1: Aura Lumina features information about partner boutiques and shops. While we carefully select our partners, we are not responsible for:
legal.partnerList1: The products or services offered by partner shops
legal.partnerList2: Any transactions between you and partner shops
legal.partnerList3: The accuracy of information provided by partner shops
legal.partnerList4: Any disputes arising from your interactions with partner shops
legal.partnerShopsDesc2: We encourage you to review the terms and policies of any shop before making a purchase.
legal.contentAccuracyDesc: We strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information on our website. However, we do not warrant that all information is complete, accurate, or current. Fashion trends, product availability, and shop details may change without notice.
legal.thirdPartyLinksTermsDesc: Our website contains links to external websites and social media platforms. We are not responsible for the content, privacy practices, or availability of these external sites. Clicking on third-party links is at your own risk.
legal.newsletterCommsDesc: By subscribing to our newsletter, you agree to receive marketing communications from Aura Lumina. You can unsubscribe at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in our emails or contacting us directly.
legal.disclaimerWarrantiesDesc: The website is provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranties, express or implied. We do not guarantee that the website will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free from viruses or other harmful components.
legal.limitationLiabilityDesc: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Aura Lumina shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the website or any content therein.
legal.indemnificationDesc: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Aura Lumina, its owners, employees, and affiliates from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of the website or violation of these terms.
legal.governingLawDesc: These Terms of Service are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Morocco. Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Casablanca, Morocco.
legal.severabilityDesc: If any provision of these terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect.
legal.contactInfoDesc: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
legal.whatAreCookiesDesc: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.
legal.howWeUseCookiesDesc: We use cookies for various purposes on our website:
legal.essentialCookiesDesc: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic features like page navigation and access to secure areas.
legal.analyticsCookiesDesc: We use analytics cookies (such as Google Analytics) to understand how visitors interact with our website. This helps us improve our content and user experience.
legal.functionalityCookiesDesc: These cookies remember your preferences and choices (such as language preferences) to provide a more personalized experience.
legal.marketingCookiesDesc: These cookies track your browsing activity to deliver relevant advertisements and measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns.
legal.sessionCookiesDesc: Temporary cookies that are deleted when you close your browser.
legal.persistentCookiesDesc: Cookies that remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them manually.
legal.thirdPartyCookiesDesc: Some cookies on our website are placed by third-party services we use:
legal.thirdPartyList1: Google Analytics - For website traffic analysis
legal.thirdPartyList2: Social media platforms - For sharing functionality
legal.thirdPartyList3: Embedded content providers - For displaying external content
legal.managingCookiesDesc: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:
legal.manageList1Desc: Most browsers allow you to refuse or accept cookies through their settings. Check your browser's help section for instructions.
legal.manageList2Desc: You can opt out of analytics tracking using tools like Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on.
legal.manageList3Desc: Use our cookie consent banner to manage your preferences when you first visit our site.
legal.impactDisablingDesc: Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website. Some features may not work as intended if cookies are blocked.
legal.doNotTrackDesc: Some browsers offer a "Do Not Track" feature. Currently, our website does not respond to Do Not Track signals, but we respect your privacy choices through our cookie consent mechanism.
legal.updatesToPolicyDesc: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: We couldn't find the page you're looking for. It may have been moved or no longer exists.
